text: Can you tell me how to achieve that?

Hi Isaac. HubSpot CMS can definitely handle hundreds of pages, before working at HubSpot, I built and worked on multiple large sites like that. HubSpot’s own website and developers website is actually built on the CMS and has hundreds of pages.

Additionally partitioning can be used to help teams stay in their lanes without conflicts. Teams are hierarchical so you can manage permissions based on your business.

its hard to fully explain it all BUT this will get you a head start… its for WP but its a similar technique for HubSpot <https://www.kelp.agency/blog/add-load-more-posts-button-wordpress-without-plugin>
